*/var item={width:"100%",padding:0,cursor:"pointer"};function itemContent(theme,ownerState){var palette=theme.palette,typography=theme.typography,transitions=theme.transitions,functions=theme.functions;var active=ownerState.active,miniSidenav=ownerState.miniSidenav,name=ownerState.name,nested=ownerState.nested,_color=ownerState.color;var white=palette.white,gradients=palette.gradients,info=palette.info;var size=typography.size,fontWeightMedium=typography.fontWeightMedium,fontWeightRegular=typography.fontWeightRegular;var pxToRem=functions.pxToRem;return{display:"flex",alignItems:"center",justifyContent:"space-between",width:"100%",padding:"".concat(pxToRem(7.2)," ").concat(pxToRem(16)),margin:"0 ".concat(pxToRem(16)," 0 ").concat(pxToRem(21.6)),userSelect:"none",position:"relative","& span":{color:active?white.main:white.main,fontWeight:active?fontWeightMedium:fontWeightRegular,fontSize:size.sm,opacity:miniSidenav?0:1,transition:transitions.create(["opacity","color"],{easing:transitions.easing.easeInOut,duration:transitions.duration.standard})},"&::before":{content:function content(){if(nested){return nested&&miniSidenav&&"\"".concat(name[0],"\"");}return miniSidenav?"\"".concat(name[0],"\""):'""';},width:function width(){if(!miniSidenav){return active?pxToRem(8):pxToRem(5);}return 0;},height:function height(){if(!miniSidenav){return active?pxToRem(8):pxToRem(5);}return 0;},// backgroundColor: info.main,
backgroundColor:function backgroundColor(){var background;if(!_color){background=info.main;}else if(_color==="warning"){background=gradients.warning.main;}else{background=palette[_color].main;}return background;},color:function color(){var value;if(!_color){value=info.main;}else if(_color==="warning"){value=gradients.warning.main;}else{value=palette[_color].main;}return value;},fontWeight:active?fontWeightMedium:fontWeightRegular,display:"flex",alignItems:"center",position:"absolute",top:"50%",transform:"translateY(-50%)",left:pxToRem(-18),opacity:1,borderRadius:"50%",fontSize:size.sm}};}function itemArrow(theme,ownerState){var typography=theme.typography,transitions=theme.transitions,functions=theme.functions,palette=theme.palette;var open=ownerState.open,miniSidenav=ownerState.miniSidenav;var dark=palette.dark,gradients=palette.gradients,white=palette.white;var size=typography.size;var pxToRem=functions.pxToRem,rgba=functions.rgba;return{fontSize:"".concat(size.md," !important"),fontWeight:500,marginRight:pxToRem(-2.5),transform:function transform(){if(open){return miniSidenav?"translateX(".concat(pxToRem(-24),") rotate(0)"):"rotate(0)";}return miniSidenav?"translateX(".concat(pxToRem(-24),") rotate(-180deg)"):"rotate(-180deg)";},color:white.main,transition:transitions.create(["color","transform"],{easing:transitions.easing.easeInOut,duration:transitions.duration.shorter})};}export{item,itemContent,itemArrow};
